main event: A civilian couple in Xenia, Ohio reported seeing a bright, blue-green light that descended to the ground and lit up the area before going out, on August 18, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for just a few seconds before disappearing.
Multiple witnesses in the Xenia and Dayton, Ohio area reported similar sightings of a bright light descending to the ground that same night.
The Air Force launched an investigation through Project Blue Book, sending the witnesses a questionnaire to gather more details about the sighting.
The Air Force ultimately concluded the sighting was likely a meteor or fireball based on the witness descriptions.
No photographs were included with the report, but the Air Force requested the witnesses provide any visual evidence they may have.
sighted object: A bright, blue-green light descending to the ground
